channel.title: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time
channel.description:
Hey reader
I currently have a little problem finding out what causes my problem. I have a few NPC's spawned by a minigame and they all load well and they do want to attack me, but once there is 1 of them attacking me, they all stop walking towards me in order to attack me. Even if I run past them, they won't do anything. I know it's probably in NPCHandler (maybe even in the void AttackPlayer method).

item.title: Multiple NPC's attacking at the same time

Hey reader

Even if I run past them, they won’t do anything. I know it’s probably in NPCHandler (maybe even in the void AttackPlayer method).
